isis.stitle: Procedural Guideline - RELAY VALVE / TRACTION CONTROL VALVE; REPLACE

wtsproc.wtsdescrip: RELAY VALVE / TRACTION CONTROL VALVE; REPLACE
wtsproc.config: This valve is installed on vehicles equipped with an Electronic or Roll Stability Program

step1.para: Install wheel chocks and open hood
Remove cab skirt panel mounted under left side cab door
Remove left side hood fender extension assembly
Disconnect traction control valve (TCV) air lines & wiring
Connect traction control valve (TCV) air lines & wiring
Install left side hood fender extension assembly
Install cab skirt panel mounted under left side cab door
Remove wheel chocks and open hood
